Class ListOfSuggestions

java.lang.Object
enquiry.ListOfSuggestions
public class ListOfSuggestions extends Object
Class acting as a database of suggestions

    • addSuggestion

      public void addSuggestion(String suggestion, String userID, camppackage.Camp camp, int suggestionIndex, boolean isItApproved, filehandler.Database database)
      Method to add suggestion during the reading of csv file before the start of the main program
      Parameters:
      suggestion - Suggestion to be added
      userID - User identification of the User who submitted the suggestion
      camp - Camp that received the suggestion
      suggestionIndex - Unique identification number for a given suggestion
      isItApproved - Status of whether a suggestion is approved
      database - Database of Users

      Returns:
      List of suggestions

    • editSuggestion

      public void editSuggestion(int index, String userID, String newSuggestion)
      Method to edit suggestion Suggestion can only be editted if the enquiry is not yet answered index does not refer to suggestionID here
      Parameters:
      index - Index positioning of suggestion in list of suggestion
      userID - User identification of user who wishers to edit suggestion
      newSuggestion - New suggestion to replace the current suggestion

    • deleteSuggestion

      public void deleteSuggestion(int index, String userID)
      Method to delete suggestion Suggestion can only be deleted by enquirer and if the enquiry is not yet answered index does not refer to suggestionID here Make the necessary conversion first before passing index
      Parameters:
      index - Index positioning of suggestion in list of suggestion
      userID - User identification of User trying to delete suggestion

    • getCampEnquiredID

      public String getCampEnquiredID(int index)
      To be used to ensure only staff of that specific camp can view suggestions Camp Name is a unique ID and will be returned to do the check
      Parameters:
      index - Index positioning of a suggestion in list of suggestions
      Returns:
      Camp name of Camp that received the specific suggestion

      Returns:

    • getIndexFromID

      public int getIndexFromID(int id)
      To be used by Replies Class to get the current index of an suggestion using the id as reference This will allow Replies Class to call the other methods using the id returns the index position of the enquiry with the corresponding userID
      Parameters:
      id - Unique identification number of a suggestion
      Returns:
      Current index position of a suggestion

    • printAllSuggestions

      public ArrayList<Integer> printAllSuggestions(camppackage.Camp camp, String userID, boolean isStaff)

      Used by committee member class to print out all their suggestions and used by staff class to print out all corresponding suggestions

      Returns arraylist containing the indexes of all enquiries, this will allow committee member to edit or delete their suggestions

      This will also allow staff to see suggestions that they can approve or deny

      Parameters:
      camp - Specific camp to print suggestions for
      userID - User identification of User who is trying to print all suggestions
      isStaff - Status of user as Staff member
      Returns:
      List of Unique identification number of suggestions

    • printAllSuggestions

      public boolean printAllSuggestions(String userID, filehandler.Database database, boolean forApprovalUse)
      Prints all suggestions for a Staff for all their camps
      Parameters:
      userID - User identification of Staff object
      database - Database of Users
      forApprovalUse - Whether the method is called for approval of suggestions or only viewing
      Returns:
      Presence of suggestion for a staff
